name: Two wizards did it
description:
A tale of two wizards locked in a never-ending battle, more or less saving the world along the way.

You can move the two wizards fighting one another.
To win, you must destroy all demons, using the ice and fire beams cast by the two mages, while keeping both of them alive so they can continue to fight forever.
When both lasers collide, they create a powerful, but dangerous, arcane explosion.

/!\ We recommend downloading the game for a better experience (plus, in browser controls are keyboard only) Controls :    - WQSD/Left joystick : Move Fire wizard 
   -  Arrow keys/Right joystick : Move Ice wizard
   - Space/Select : retry current level
   - Escape/Start : pause game

Made by Maxence Maire, Raphaël Blanchard and Timothé Magis for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 !
